column1: If set to "No", alert emails will be generated, but won't be sent automatically, while manual sending will be allowed
column2: If set to "No", alert emails will be generated, but won't be sent automatically, while manual sending will be allowed

column1: The system will send alerts after the above mentioned amount of days upon order placement
column2: The system will send alerts after the above mentioned amount of days upon order placement

column1: If set to "Yes" the system shows random reviews. Otherwise shows most recent
column2: If set to "Yes", the system displays random reviews. Otherwise displays most recent ones.

column1: The system shows above mentioned count of reviews in the block
column2: The system displays the above mentioned number of reviews in the block.

column1: If set to zero the system shows full review text. If not - cuts up to above metioned words count
column2: If set to zero, the system displays full review text. If not - cuts up to the above mentioned number of words.
If set to "Yes", the system will display rating stars.

column1: If set to "Yes", the system will display only summary rating.
column2: If set to "Yes", the system will display only summary rating.

column1: For example 4.8 or 3.5. Set 0 to show all reviews
column2: For example 4.8 or 3.5. Set to zero to display all ratings.

column1: Show reviews from the current category only
column2: If set to "Yes", the system shows reviews from the current category only.

column1: Show only unique reviews per user session. Recommended if you have a lot of reviews.
column2: If set to "Yes", the system shows only unique reviews during a user session. Recommended if you have a lot of reviews.

column1: If set to "Yes", the system shows reviews for the current product only.
column2: If set to "Yes", the system shows reviews for the current product only.
